title: Windows 8.1 Pro X64 + Office15 ESD en-US Juni 2015 {Generation2}
description:
* Windows 8.1 Pro VL X64 & Office 15 ESD en-US Juni 2015 {Generation2}


[ RELEASE INFO ]


* File: W81.PRO.X64.OF15.en-US.Jun2015.iso

* Size: 5,86GB
* Format: Bootable ISO

* Sources: 
* Windows 8.1 X64 : dvd 6050880
* Office 2013 SP1 X86: X19-35821
 
* CRC32: c73bd256
* MD5 : a6f1f4420f8b6954987682028aa2f5bc
* SHA-1: 8332c1d7642967af051d4dfb0870ec28cb3ffce4

* Language: en-US  [ English - USA ]

[ CONTENTS ]

* Integrated / Pre-installed in Audit Mode:

* .NET Framework 2.0, 3.0 & 3.5
* .NET Framework 4.5.2 (KB2901907)
* Important & Security Updates - 2015-06-09

* Office 2013 updated through March 2015
 
[ EDITIONS INCLUDED ]

* Windows 8.1 Pro    I
* Windows 8.1 Pro    II
* Windows 8.1 Pro    III
* Windows 8.1 Pro    IV

* I  =  Standard
* II =  Activated
* III = Office 2013 SP1 integrated
* IV =  Office 2013 SP1 integrated + Activated

[ Screenshots ] <a href="
http://postimg.org/gallery/m8uccvkc/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://postimg.org/gallery/m8uccvkc/</a>

* Activator: KMSpico v10.0.4 Portable Edition 	
[ Potential False Positive Virus Alarm ]

* To activate Office, use Microsoft Toolkit.
* Extract attached MTKV253.zip, click the Office button, 
* install AutoKMS, and then click the Activate button.

[ FEATURES ]

* Diagnostics and Recovery Toolset 8.1 (Microsoft DaRT)
* install.wim compressed to recovery format (install.esd)

[ INSTALLATION & INFORMATION ]

* Create bootable USB (highly recommended) with Rufus,
* (attached) or burn to DVD at slow speed.

* Credits:
* milrob and stevie-boy for continued support and help with user questions.


* Hope you will enjoy this release!

* Regards,
* Generation2 @ KAT & TPB
